About This Page

The "Entry Details" page displays data for the given entry being viewed.

It makes use of the following tags:

  • Channel:Entries to display data for the entry.
  • Favorites:Count to display the number of times the entry has been saved by members of the site.
  • Favorites:Saved_By to display a list all members that saved the current entry to their favorites.
  • Favorites:Related_Entries to display a list of other entries also favorited by members who favorited the current entry.
  • Favorites:Info to display and handle formatting of favorites info and adding/updating/removing favorites functionality for the currently logged in user.
  • Favorites:Form to allow the currently logged in user to add the entry to their favorites.
  • Favorites:Edit to allow the currently logged in user to update or remove the entry from their favorites.

The global sidebar on the right makes use of the following tags:

  • Favorites:Collections filtered by type (entry/member), to display a list of all the currently available Favorites collections for the site.
  • Favorites:Entries to display the saved favorited entries of the currently logged in user.
  • Favorites:Members to display the saved favorited members of the currently logged in user.
